property.name: jobmanager.rpc.port
property.description: The RPC port where the JobManager is reachable.

property.name: taskmanager.numberOfTaskSlots
property.description: The number of task slots that each TaskManager offers. Each slot runs one parallel pipeline.

property.name: parallelism.default
property.description: The parallelism used for programs that did not specify and other parallelism.

property.name: state.checkpoints.dir
property.description: Directory for checkpoints filesystem, when using any of the default bundled state backends.

property.name: state.savepoints.dir
property.description: Default target directory for savepoints, optional.

property.name: jobmanager.execution.failover-strategy
property.description: The failover strategy

property.name: rest.port
property.description: The port to which the REST client connects to. If rest.bind-port has not been specified, then the server will bind to this port as well.

property.name: rest.bind-port
property.description: The port to which the REST client connects to. If rest.bind-port has not been specified, then the server will bind to this port as well.

property.name: classloader.resolve-order
property.description: The classloading resolve order.

property.name: classloader.check-leaked-classloader
property.description: The classloading resolve order.

property.name: jobmanager.archive.fs.dir
property.description: Directory to upload completed jobs to.

property.name: historyserver.web.address
property.description: The address under which the web-based HistoryServer listens.

property.name: historyserver.web.port
property.description: The port under which the web-based HistoryServer listens.

property.name: historyserver.archive.fs.dir
property.description: Comma separated list of directories to monitor for completed jobs.

property.name: historyserver.archive.fs.refresh-interval
property.description: Interval in milliseconds for refreshing the monitored directories.

property.name: historyserver.web.tmpdir
property.description: Local directory that is used by the history server REST API for temporary files.

property.name: historyserver.web.refresh-interval
property.description: The refresh interval for the HistoryServer web-frontend in milliseconds.

property.name: env.hadoop.conf.dir
property.description: Path to hadoop configuration directory. It is required to read HDFS and/or YARN configuration. You can also set it via environment variable.

property.name: env.java.home
property.description: JAVA_HOME

property.name: env.java.opts
property.description: Java options to start the JVM of all Flink processes with.

property.name: env.pid.dir
property.description: Defines the directory where the flink-<host>-<process>.pid files are saved.

property.name: env.log.dir
property.description: Defines the directory where the Flink logs are saved. It has to be an absolute path. (Defaults to the log directory under Flink home)

property.name: env.log.max
property.description: The maximum number of old log files to keep.
